name: Someday, We All Must Walk Alone
desc: Your little saurian companion seems to have something to tell you...

value.text: Someday We All Must Walk Alone

customize.name: In the Footsteps of the Chosen of Dragons
customize.desc: A World Quest Series following the many adventures of Little One, Traveler and Paimon in Natlan.

customize.name: Feeling Like Fish Today!
customize.desc: Wouldn't it be great if you could catch some fish for your Saurian buddy...? Ace Angler Paimon you're up!

customize.name: Special Friends
customize.desc: Your Saurian buddy wants to make some new friends...

customize.name: Lies and Promises
customize.desc: You discover a Yumkasaurus standing in the way of some treasure. Can you find a way to make it leave...?

customize.name: Lights, Kamera, Action!
customize.desc: It's time you shot a film starring your Saurian companion!

customize.name: A Saurian Lover's Ordinary Days
customize.desc: You encounter someone surrounded by three Saurians out in the wild...

customize.name: Tepetlisaurus Hide-and-Seek
customize.desc: After running into a whole bunch of Tepetlisaurus while you're out on the road, you let Little One go off to play with them. But then it doesn't come back...

customize.name: Weighty Wings
customize.desc: You find an injured Saurian in the wild...

customize.name: Gifts and Gifts in Return
customize.desc: Your Saurian companion gifts you the treasures it had been carefully collecting. Now, what would make a good thank-you gift...?

customize.name: Waiting For Seeds to Sprout
customize.desc: Little One digs up a strange seed...

customize.name: Treasures and Collectors
customize.desc: Try your luck at the Saurian Relics Excavation Site!

customize.name: Sauro-Vet's Dilemma
customize.desc: You encounter a Qucusaurus attacking a human, but there seems to be more to this scene than meets the eye...

customize.name: The Lone Isle Named Night
customize.desc: You've discovered a hidden chamber deep within the Isle of Night...

customize.name: Stones, Coconuts, and Saurian Traffickers
customize.desc: In a remote location near the Flower-Feather Clan's borders, a traveling merchant and his Saurian companion have encountered a mysterious problem...

customize.name: Friends of Fire and Water
customize.desc: You and Paimon discover a suspicious campsite somewhere within the Flower-Feathered Clan territory. There, you unexpectedly rescue a Blubberbeast. It seems to make a good friend for your Saurian companion...

customize.name: Is "Intensity" Really the Key?
customize.desc: Shall "intensity" vanquish the cold, or must some other step up to the plate?

customize.name: Tale of Dreams Plucked From Fire
customize.desc: A World Quest series following Chikya, a woman of the Night-Wind Clan, to search for the "panacea."

customize.name: Tracer No Tracing
customize.desc: In the depths of some searing ruins, you meet a young woman...

customize.name: Seeker No Finding
customize.desc: Search for the legendary "elixir that can cure all injuries" with Chikya.

customize.name: Shadows of the Mountains
customize.desc: A World Quest series following Titu, a storyteller, to investigate the Shadow Pins.

customize.name: Beneath the Crystal Rock
customize.desc: Help Titu resolve the Shadow Pin issue and reinforce the seal placed upon the Abyss.

customize.name: Peace to the Slumbering
customize.desc: The Greater Shadow Pin falls, opening a huge hole in the ground...

customize.name: Between Pledge and Forgettance
customize.desc: A World Quest Series following Little One, a little Tepetlisaurus that received "Blessing," to cure it.

customize.name: Lost in the Woods
customize.desc: After having just arrived in Natlan, you are teleported to a strange space...

customize.name: Rite of the Bold
customize.desc: Go to the Children of Echoes and search for clues concerning the Volcanic Token.

customize.name: Revelations from the Past
customize.desc: You have obtained permission to make a pilgrimage to the volcano from Pacal. Set out with Little One after you finish your preparations.

customize.name: Lost Traveler in the Ashen Realm
customize.desc: A World Quest Series following Bona and Coco, an adventurer and her companion, to find the Jade of Return and track the evil dragon down.

customize.name: Vaulting the Wall of Morning Mist
customize.desc: To find the unknown treasure known as the Jade of Return and track the evil dragon down, you have stepped into ancient ruins to which entry is considered forbidden...

customize.name: Adventure in the Land of Mists
customize.desc: After finally repelling the evil dragon, you and the self-proclaimed adventurer Bona set off on a journey alongside the mysterious Cocouik to find the Tonatiuh and the Jade of Return...

customize.name: Palace of the Vision Serpent
customize.desc: Following Cocouik's guidance, you come to the palace ruins on Ochkanatlan's upper levels. There seems to be something hidden beneath these ruins...

customize.name: To the Sky-Road
customize.desc: With two pieces of Pyrophosphorite in hand, the road to the skies is open to you at last...

customize.name: The Other Side of the Sky
customize.desc: Passing through an ocean of clouds, you finally arrive at the legendary Tonatiuh...

customize.name: Moment of Awakening
customize.desc: To get the Jade of Return, you chase the evil dragon all the way to the very end...

customize.name: The Chosen One's Promise
customize.desc: Go back to Tonatiuh and meet up with your companions.

customize.name: From One Case to Another
customize.desc: Aid Taruka in the Scorchwind Trial Grounds, to investigate the suspicious Lamizana.

customize.name: Incidents Are Ever Sudden
customize.desc: At Pakpaka Flying School, what seemed like just another routine challenge mission at first...

customize.name: Beat the Clock: 24 Hours
customize.desc: The plot thickens...

customize.name: An Air Race and an Alibi
customize.desc: Could the air race be a trap set by Lamizana?

customize.name: Farewell, Final Saurus Cracker
customize.desc: Looks like it'll take more effort to get everything cleared up...

customize.name: Nahuatzin's Leap
customize.desc: Find a way to enter the volcano...

customize.name: The Frozen, Rekindling Land
customize.desc: You finally enter the volcano only to find pitch darkness all around. Continue exploring this place..

customize.name: The Forsaken Sea of Wisdom
customize.desc: Find and stabilize the Astral Assemblage(s) to activate the Celestial Axis at the center of the Sacred City…

customize.name: Sealed Site of Sacrifice
customize.desc: Find and stabilize the Astral Assemblage(s) to activate the Celestial Axis at the center of the Sacred City…

customize.name: In Search of a Hidden Heart
customize.desc: The guide who has possessed the Secret Source Servant seems intent on guiding visitors to the "Heart of the Sacred Mountain"... However, getting there appears to require a permit, along with the activation of the Secret Source Dragon Idol guarding the entrance. Perhaps the Secret Source Servant can shed more light on the situation...

customize.name: Once, the Sacred Seat of Judgment
customize.desc: In order to uncover a path to the Heart of the Sacred Mountain, it appears you must obtain a permit from the Chamber of Deliberation

customize.text: Archon Quest Chapter V: Act I:
Archon Quest Chapter V: Act V:

customize.name: When All Becomes a Monument
customize.desc: Side by side with Mavuika, you defeat Gosoythoth and emerge as a hero revered by all in Natlan. Take this moment to enjoy the glory that is rightfully yours.

customize.name: To the Night, What is the Night's
customize.desc: You encounter a strange door out in the wilds of Natlan...

customize.name: Open Your Heart to Me
customize.desc: At Ochkanatlan, you discover an underground structure so deep as to seem bottomless...

customize.name: Come Fly With Me
customize.desc: Come fly with me, let's fly, let's fly away- Uh, but not too far away, okay?

customize.text:
The Way Into the Mountain
Investigator of Ancient Ruins
A Brief History of Rocks
The Attack of the... Purple Tepetilisaurus?
Complete Overworld Puzzles:
Ancient Sacred Mountain Dragon Puzzle
Find Urubamba's Tatankasaurus
Flower-Feather Clan Kamera Puzzle
<color=#ffffff>Quest Chain</color>

customize.name: Adventure EXP
customize.desc: Adventure EXP. Used to improve Adventure Rank.

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>Achievements</color>
Then You Will Be Free to...

Return to where you first met your saurian companion
<color=#ffffff>Quest Items</color>

customize.name: Photo With Travel Companions
customize.desc: A photo of you and your travel companions; a memento of a land where humans and saurians coexist. Though our paths may eventually diverge, the memories we create together shall never fade.

customize.name: Little One
customize.desc: A little Tepetlisaurus that received theBlessing. It accompanied the Traveler on a pilgrimage to the Great Volcano of Tollan to remove the mark.
